Name: Yukinas Diary
About the game: Born in a royal Family, where the Father spent the greatest Heroic deed of all times. It was he who defeated the Demon King, as well as liberated the country from the tyranny of the then reigning King, who simply watched as the Demon King rampaged through the World, entrenching himself in fear and considering neighboring Villages as a necessary sacrifice to save his own skin. In Yukina's Diary you play the Daughter and heroine, of this great King. When Yukina returns from her journey to the Castle, something terrible happens..... Along the way she finds new companions and has to face numerous challenges as well as her own destiny. Accompany her on her way. The current Early Access phase includes The first 32 hours of gameplay! The upcoming full Version will include the following: over 50 hours of gameplay over 140 Enemies over 180 Equipment Items over 5 Character Classes over 40 trading Cards that can be collected in exchange for special Items or used for special Skills! Hotkeys Press F4 Get Fullscreen. Press F5 Restart the Game. Demo Version: Playable are the first 6 hours Save Games If you decide to get the full Version of Yukinas Diary, the save games will not be transferred automatically, but you can add them manually and continue playing the full Version directly from where you saved the game. Click on Library in Steam. Right click on Yukina's Diary Demo. Go to Manage and select Browse Local Files. Go to the folder www. Copy the folder save. Select the full version of Yukinas Diary. Right click on manage local files. In the folder www you paste the copied folder. Hint I also came up with something Special for the Early Access participants: As a Follower of my Twitch Channel you will receive giveaways that allow you to immortalize yourself in the Game during the Early Access phase. More info on my Twitch channel, which you can access directly from the game itself. This privilege will expire as soon as the Game is released as a full Version. Be a part of something big.
